message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $18,000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $12,000 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down to $16,000.  This product is truly top-of-the-line and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm still a bit concerned about the price. Would you be willing to consider $14,000?
